## Color spaces

The **colormath** package provides simple functions for defining and manipulating colors. Colors can be defined in any of the following color spaces: 

- [RGB](), generated by `rgb()`
    - Can also be specified as a [hex string]() using `hex()`
- [HSL](), generated by `hsl()`
- [HSV](), generated by `hsv()`
- [YUV](), generated by `yuv()`
